_setup_instructions.note: Remove this key and uncomment the services you want to activate. Each service enables additional agents and skills.

setup: 1. Register at https://publisher.indeed.com/publisher/ (free for personal use)
2. Receive your Publisher ID from Indeed
3. Uncomment the 'indeed' entry below and replace YOUR_PUBLISHER_ID
4. The search-jobs command will switch from assisted-manual to API mode automatically
1. Go to https://console.cloud.google.com/ and create a project
4. Download credentials.json and place it in services/connectors/google-drive/
6. On first use, Claude will prompt you to authorize access

indeed.comment: Indeed Publisher API — uncomment to enable automated job search

google-drive.comment: Google Drive storage connector — uncomment to enable cloud artifact storage
